SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.delivery_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') delivery_start_date, date_format(A.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_date, A.*,D.*,B.*,C.*, (SELECT Z.product_class_name FROM product_class_code Z WHERE Z.product_class_code_type = 'M' AND Z.product_class_code = C.product_made_company_cd) AS product_made_company_name, (SELECT Z.store_name FROM store Z WHERE Z.supplier_cd = C.product_supplier) AS product_supplier_name, (SELECT Z.store_id FROM store Z WHERE Z.supplier_cd = C.product_supplier) AS product_supplier_id, (SELECT Z.product_class_name FROM product_class_code Z WHERE Z.product_class_code_type = 'B' AND Z.product_class_code = C.product_brand) AS product_brand_name, (SELECT Z.product_class_name FROM product_class_code Z WHERE Z.product_class_code_type = 'T' AND Z.product_class_code = C.product_trend) AS product_trend_name, (SELECT Z.product_class_name FROM product_class_code Z WHERE Z.product_class_code_type = 'O' AND Z.product_class_code = C.product_origin) AS product_origin_name, (SELECT Z.code_name FROM code Z WHERE Z.code = 'payment_status' AND Z.code_value = A.payment_status ) AS payment_status_name, (select Z.code_name from code Z where Z.code = 'product_payment_type' AND Z.code_value = D.pay_method) as pay_method_name, (SELECT if(SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class, '|', 1) = 'A','과세상품',Z.code_name) FROM code Z WHERE Z.code = 'product_tex_class' AND Z.code_value = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class, '|', 1) ) AS product_tex_class_name, if(SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class, '|', -1) IN ('A','B','C'),NULL,SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class, '|', -1)) AS product_tex
FROM payment_bundle A LEFT JOIN payment D ON A.order_no = D.order_no LEFT JOIN delivery_info B ON A.order_no = B.order_no LEFT JOIN product C ON A.product_cd = C.product_cd WHERE A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.${pk} in
#{item}
order by A.reg_date desc
